abstract: Proponents of debt forgiveness note that roughly one out of five Americans owes more on a home than it is worth, and that negative equity totals almost $700 billion.
snippet: Proponents of debt forgiveness note that roughly one out of five Americans owes more on a home than it is worth, and that negative equity totals almost $700 billion.
lead_paragraph: California’s attorney general, Kamala D. Harris, has ratcheted up the pressure on Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac to allow debt reduction on their home loans by asking the mortgage finance giants to halt foreclosures in the state.

headline.main: Pressure Grows on Fannie and Freddie to Cut Principal on Loans
headline.print_headline: Pressure Grows on Fannie and Freddie to Reduce Principal on Some Loans

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
